pr_title: add new JSONLITE serializer to rpc

timeline.message: add new JSONLITE serializer to rpc

timeline.body: I know it is a copy, but we should use English here.
timeline.bodyText: I know it is a copy, but we should use English here.
timeline.bodyHTML: I know it is a copy, but we should use English here.
timeline.author: stavamichal

timeline.body: Method "jsonFactory.createJsonGenerator()" is deprecated. Is there any chance to change that without great effort?
timeline.bodyText: Method "jsonFactory.createJsonGenerator()" is deprecated. Is there any chance to change that without great effort?
timeline.bodyHTML: Method "jsonFactory.createJsonGenerator()" is deprecated. Is there any chance to change that without great effort?
timeline.author: stavamichal

timeline.bodyHTML:
We should probably keep standard ignored properties from JsonSerializer and only add newly requested ignores.

	@JsonIgnoreProperties({"name"})
	private interface AttributeMixIn {
	}

	@JsonIgnoreProperties({"name"})
	private interface AttributeDefinitionMixIn {
	}

	@JsonIgnoreProperties({"commonName", "displayName"})
	private interface UserMixIn {
	}

	@JsonIgnoreProperties({"userExtSources"})
	private interface CandidateMixIn {
	}

	@JsonIgnoreProperties({"cause", "localizedMessage", "stackTrace"})
	private interface PerunExceptionMixIn {
	}
timeline.author: zlamalp

timeline.message: replace deprecated method calls according to Jackson Javadocs
